task: Write a Python function that takes an AWS S3 bucket ARN as input and extracts just the bucket name from it. The function should handle ARNs in the format 'arn:aws:s3:::bucket-name' and return only the bucket name portion.

Create a JSON object that defines an AWS IAM policy allowing read-only access to a specific S3 bucket named 'my-app-logs'. The policy should include the necessary statements to list bucket contents and get objects.

Write a regex pattern that validates AWS EC2 instance IDs. The pattern should match instance IDs that start with 'i-' followed by either 8 hexadecimal characters (old format) or 17 hexadecimal characters (new format).
